list_translation_mean.translate_mean: nơi hẹn gặp nhau để đi săn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: come into the presence or company of (someone) by chance or arrangement.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a week later I met him in the street
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một tuần sau tôi gặp anh ấy trên đường phố

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: icebergs are created when glaciers meet the sea
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Icebergs được tạo ra khi sông băng gặp biển

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: fulfill or satisfy (a need, requirement, or condition).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: this policy is doing nothing to meet the needs of women
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chính sách này là không làm gì để đáp ứng nhu cầu của phụ nữ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an organized event at which a number of races or other sporting contests are held.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it is a theater meet for great events
